head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PELAVIN, MACK FANNE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PELAVIN, MACK FANNE

block.p: PELAVIN-Mack Fanne, age 93, of Pompano Beach, Fl., formerly of Flint, Mich. and Hackensack. Mother of Susan (John) Saril, David (Jane) Mack, Jeremy Mack, Peter (Carol) Mack, beloved grandmoter of Steven, Diane, Alexander, Nicholas, Avram, David, Benjamin, Joshua, Melissa, Dinah, and great-grandmother of Matthew, Rebecca, Jonathan, and Eliza. Loving companion of Irving Cohen. Contributions would be appreciated to the Jacob Perlow Hospice c/o Beth Israel Hospital N.Y.C. Services are 10:00 a.m. today Riverside Memorial Chapel 180 West 76th Street N.Y.C.
